docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.
tkregister2 is a tool to assist in the manual tuning of the linear registration between two volumes, mainly for the purpose of interacting with the FreeSurfer anatomical stream.

docs.title: Regheader center flag
docs.description: Same as --regheader but aligns volume centers.

docs.title: GCA subject
docs.description: Subject ID for linear GCA registration check.

docs.title: GCA skull subject
docs.description: Subject ID for linear 'with skull' GCA registration check.

docs.title: No zero CRAS flag
docs.description: Do not zero target cras (done with --fstal).

docs.title: Apply movable brightness to target flag
docs.description: Apply movable brightness to the target.

docs.title: View plane
docs.description: Startup view plane: cor, sag, ax.

docs.title: Movable volume scale
docs.description: Scale size of movable volume by scale.

docs.title: Surface RGB color
docs.description: Set surface color (0-255) for R G B.

docs.title: FSTAL flag
docs.description: Set movable to be tal and reg to be taliarach.xfm.

docs.title: Talairach transform name
docs.description: Set movable to be tal and reg to be talxfmname.

docs.title: Tag flag
docs.description: Tag movable volume near the col/row origin.

docs.title: Movable volume orientation
docs.description: Supply orientation string for movable volume.

docs.title: Target volume orientation
docs.description: Supply orientation string for target volume.

docs.title: Determinant output file
docs.description: Save determinant of registration matrix to specified file.

docs.title: Load aseg flag
docs.description: Load aseg and hit 'd' to toggle.

docs.title: Load aparc+aseg flag
docs.description: Load aparc+aseg and hit 'c' to toggle.

docs.title: Load wmparc flag
docs.description: Load wmparc and hit 'c' to toggle.

docs.title: Translation vector
docs.description: Translation (mm) to apply to registration matrix.

docs.title: Rotation angles
docs.description: Rotation angles (deg) to apply to registration matrix.

docs.title: Conform target flag
docs.description: Conform target (assumes reg computed to conform target, eg, GCA).
tkregister2 is a tool to assist in the manual tuning of the linear registration between two volumes, mainly for the purpose of interacting with the FreeSurfer anatomical stream.
